title: Title: Sound On: Gas Prices, Bannon Contempt Charge (Radio)
itunes:title: Title: Sound On: Gas Prices, Bannon Contempt Charge (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Tom Kloza, Global Head of Energy Analysis, Oil Price Information Service at IHS Markit, Jonathan Adler, Law Professor and Director of the Burke Center for Environmental Law at Case Western Reserve University and Bloomberg Politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
